scripts.update-cntr: dotnet aspnet-codegenerator controller -name UserDatabaseController -async -api -outDir Controllers -dc webapi.MyDbContext.MyUserContext -m webapi.MyDbContext.User -f
scripts.update-view: dotnet aspnet-codegenerator view             UserDatabaseView List              -outDir Views       -dc webapi.MyDbContext.MyUserContext -m webapi.MyDbContext.User -f
